description: ​Microsoft says it will improve security across Entra tenants where security defaults are enabled by making multifactor authentication (MFA) registration mandatory. [...]
title: Microsoft Entra "security defaults" to make MFA setup mandatory

description: QNAP has fixed a second zero-day vulnerability exploited at the Pwn2Own Ireland 2024 hacking contest to gain a root shell and take over a TS-464 NAS device. [...]
title: QNAP patches second zero-day exploited at Pwn2Own to get root

description: The North Korean state-sponsored hacking group tracked as 'Andariel' has been linked to the Play ransomware operation, using the RaaS to work behind the scenes and evade sanctions. [...]
title: North Korean govt hackers linked to Play ransomware attack

description: A new version of the FakeCall malware for Android hijacks outgoing calls from a user to their bank, redirecting them to the attacker's phone number instead. [...]
title: Android malware "FakeCall" now reroutes bank calls to attackers

description: A global large-scale dubbed "EmeraldWhale" exploited misconfigured Git configuration files to steal over 15,000 cloud account credentials from thousands of private repositories. [...]
title: Hackers steal 15,000 cloud credentials from exposed Git config files

description: The Federal Bureau of Investigation (FBI) is warning of multiple schemes taking advantage of the upcoming U.S. general election to scam people out of their money or personal data. [...]
title: FBI: Upcoming U.S. general election fuel multiple fraud schemes
